data.title: Mobile & Backend Developer (Flutter, Swift, Node.js)
data.bio: I am a developer with over three years of experience in mobile and backend development using Flutter, Swift, and Node.js. I have published more than six applications on the App Store and Play Store. My focus is on creating smart, innovative apps by integrating AI technologies such as OpenAI (ChatGPT) and Gemini into my projects. My goal is to combine my expertise in Flutter, native mobile, and AI development to build powerful, full-stack mobile solutions.

nodelabs.description: Developing and maintaining advanced mobile applications using Flutter with clean architecture and scalable UI patterns. Focused on performance, maintainability, and seamless integration of AI-based features across projects.

iwwomi.description: Developed large-scale Flutter applications integrated with backend systems. Contributed to major projects like TRHaber and TaxiEMS, enhancing app performance and implementing modern architectures and Stripe-based payments.

juniustech.description: Built production-ready applications for clients, integrating Flutter with Firebase, Speech-to-Text, and Gemini APIs. Delivered educational and healthcare projects with real-time AI-assisted features.

piton.description: Contributed to professional Flutter development projects, focusing on UI scalability, state management, and clean code standards.

flo.description: Participated in remote software development projects and online meetings, collaborating on mobile app tasks with other interns.

eltagron.description: Developed cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter and MySQL backend integration. Designed and deployed APIs, gaining deep experience in full-stack mobile system design.

movieApp.title: Movie App
movieApp.description: A comprehensive movie discovery application built with Clean Architecture principles. Features include pagination for efficient data handling, Firebase integration for real-time sync, complete user management system, multi-language support (localization), and dynamic theme switching (dark/light mode). This project showcases modern Flutter development practices and scalable architecture patterns.

joylive.title: JoyLive - Live Streaming App
joylive.description: A sophisticated live streaming platform developed at NodeLabs Software. Contributed to the development of key features including real-time video streaming, user interactions, and robust backend integration. The app provides seamless live broadcasting experience with modern Flutter architecture and scalable solutions.

soundcare.title: SoundCare: Speaker Cleaner
soundcare.description: A professional speaker cleaning application that uses sound frequencies to remove water and dust from phone speakers. Features premium subscription management with RevenueCat, monetization through Google Ads, and comprehensive analytics with Firebase. The app provides an effective solution for maintaining speaker quality and clarity.

siteManagement.title: Site Management App
siteManagement.description: A comprehensive site management application built as graduation project. The system consists of three interconnected Flutter apps working together seamlessly. Features include real-time video calls with ZegoCloud, complete Firebase integration, and scalable Clean Architecture implementation. This project demonstrates the ability to architect complex, multi-app ecosystems.

trhaber.title: TRHaber Mobile App
trhaber.description: Developed the new mobile version of TRHaber, a major news platform reaching thousands of users daily. Focused on improved performance, modern UI, and enhanced scalability.

taxi.title: TaxiEMS Mobile App
taxi.description: A taxi booking application with Stripe payment integration. Built for a smooth, real-time ride-booking experience with modern Flutter UI and Firebase backend.

purellm.title: PureLLM ‚Äì On-Device AI Model Runner
purellm.description: A Swift-based app running local AI models with MediaPipe for privacy and offline use. Combined Flutter UI with native Swift for high-performance hybrid architecture.

ceptedershane.title: Cepte Dershane ‚Äì Exam Assistant
ceptedershane.description: Cross-platform education assistant app using Firebase, Firestore, and OpenAI/Gemini APIs for smart study suggestions and progress tracking.

greenscore.title: GreenScore ‚Äì Recycling App
greenscore.description: Developed during a Google DSC Hackathon; achieved second place. Integrated Gemini AI with advanced camera features for recycling detection and tracking.

info.title: Info
info.description: You can contact me to learn more about my projects, experiences, and articles. You can reach my social media accounts through the links below or send an email.

gdsc.title: 2nd Place ‚Äî Google Developer Student Clubs Hackathon 2024
gdsc.description: Awarded second place at the national GDSC Hackathon for developing an innovative Flutter application integrating Gemini AI and Firebase technologies.

initial.greeting1:
Hello!

Welcome to my portfolio! Here I share my projects, experiences, and skills. You're here to learn more about me, explore my projects, or just say hello.

Feel free to browse and if you see something you like, share it with me!
initial.greeting2: What caught your attention the most? Which of the projects, designs, or technologies in my portfolio interests you the most? If you have any questions, feel free to ask, I'm here to help you.

replies.positive1: It's so great to see you here! Thank you for sharing your thoughts and ideas.
replies.positive2: Your ideas are very valuable! It's really great that you're so interested.
replies.positive3: It's wonderful to read your message. I'm happy to receive such feedback.
replies.positive4: Seeing interested people like you here makes me very happy. Thank you!
replies.positive5: Your comments and thoughts are very important to me. It's great that you're here!
